overview_of_class: This is an introductory course to Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry. Topics include Symplectic manifolds, Lagrangian and other special submanifolds, intersection properties, Hamiltonian equations, canonical transformations, integrable systems and normal forms, fixed point theorems and Arnold Conjecture.
name: Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry
subject: MATH
